Lunarpine runs away from tha Ark, not paying attention to which way 
he was running. (Ramhorn can spot him if he's looking at scanners.)  
He'd almost gotten in a fight with Ripper. The Maximals were 
shorthanded here or he'd go elsewhere. There isn't much use for an 
imperfect Bot. his scanners were useless, no visual tracking, no long 
range scans, even his mapping systems seemed different.

Looking back to the Ark, he thought "I'll be back soon." Somewhere 
inside him he knew they'd need the help of every Maximal.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She reached the pod nad looked at it.  She thought about how this 
was 
> running away again.  She shook her head and thought a 
moment.  "Nah, 
> I have to quit running and jsut deal with it."
> 
> She flew back heading back to the maximal base.  She wanted to talk 
> to lunarpine about what he had said and try to mjend things.  She 
> hoped that he would not be too harsh on her for taking the hit for 
> him.  She smiled.  She thought back to went they were playing in 
the 
> forest and she caught thaqt crow for him.  She swooped down and 
> stopped at a branch hugh in the tree.  She waited a bit.  She 
finally 
> saw a nice fat crow flying by.  She swooped down and caught it in 
her 
> talons.  She carried it back to the base.  It would be a nice treat 
> for her friend.  At least she hoped that they were still friends.
